text: Ani ibrahimace apalya pityakarita maphici du'a-prarthana karane he kevala tya vacanacya sababivara hote, je tyanni apalya pityasa dile hote, maga jevha tyanna hi gosta spastatah kalali ki to (pita) allahaca satru ahe, tevha te tyacyapasuna dura jhale. Vastavika ibrahima mothe komalahrdayi sahanasila hote
